Saxycd12,"2020-08-12T14:26:31.603Z","Great picture, boring build ","

I love the idea of building a set that I could hang on the wall.
The packaging looks great, all colours in separate bags etc.&nbsp
The instructions are easy to follow and the instruction book is great.
I picked the picture that I wanted to build first and happy with how it looks.
The downside of this build is that it&rsquo
column3: t any skill required, just the ability to follow how many lego dots of which colour are on each line. The entire build took approximately 4 hours.&nbsp
